1: הַחֲרִ֤ישׁוּ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>Keep silence</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אִיִּ֔ים <sup>339 </sup> <n>before me O islands</n> וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>and let the people</n> יַחֲלִ֣יפוּ <sup>2498 </sup> <n>renew</n> כֹ֑חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>[their] strength</n> יִגְּשׁוּ֙ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>let them come near</n> אָ֣ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>then</n> יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>then let them speak</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>to judgment</n> נִקְרָֽבָה׃ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>let us come near</n>

23: הַגִּ֙ידוּ֙ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>Shew</n> הָאֹתִיּ֣וֹת <sup>857 </sup> <n>the things that are to come</n> לְאָח֔וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>hereafter</n> וְנֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that we may know</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>that ye [are] gods</n> אַתֶּ֑ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> תֵּיטִ֣יבוּ <sup>3190 </sup> <n>yea do good</n> וְתָרֵ֔עוּ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>or do evil</n> וְנִשְׁתָּ֖עָה <sup>8159 </sup> <n>that we may be dismayed</n> [וְנֵרֶא כ] (וְנִרְאֶ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>advise self</n> ק) יַחְדָּֽו׃ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>[it] together</n>

25: הַעִיר֤וֹתִי <sup>5782 </sup> <n>I have raised up</n> מִצָּפוֹן֙ <sup>6828 </sup> <n>[one] from the north</n> וַיַּ֔את <sup>857 </sup> <n>and he shall come</n> מִמִּזְרַח־ <sup>4217 </sup> <n>from the rising</n> שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>of the sun</n> יִקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>shall he call</n> בִשְׁמִ֑י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>upon my name</n> וְיָבֹ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and he shall come</n> סְגָנִים֙ <sup>5461 </sup> <n>upon princes</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>according to</n> חֹ֔מֶר <sup>2563 </sup> <n>as [upon] morter</n> וּכְמ֥וֹ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>Even</n> יוֹצֵ֖ר <sup>3335 </sup> <n>and as the potter</n> יִרְמָס־ <sup>7429 </sup> <n>treadeth</n> טִֽיט׃ <sup>2916 </sup> <n>clay</n>
26: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הִגִּ֤יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>Who hath declared</n> מֵרֹאשׁ֙ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>from the beginning</n> וְנֵדָ֔עָה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that we may know</n> וּמִלְּפָנִ֖ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>? and beforetime</n> וְנֹאמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that we may say</n> צַדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>just</n> אַ֣ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>Surely</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מַגִּ֗יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>declared</n> אַ֚ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>Surely</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>was no</n> מַשְׁמִ֔יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>yea [there is] none that declareth</n> אַ֥ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>Surely</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>one</n> שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>yea [there is] none that heareth</n> אִמְרֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>561 </sup> <n>your words</n>
